intro: Push the pushbutton to start and stop the fan

build.steps: Place the motor and potentiometer  on the breadboard

steps: 1.Connect a jumper wire from 5V to the third pin of the potentiometer
2.Connect a jumper wire from GND to breadboard negative rail
3.Connect breadboard negative rail to pin 1 of the potentiomter using jumper
4.Connect a jumper wire from A4 to the middle pin of the potentiometer
1.Connect a jumper wire from D10 to the positive pin of the motor
2.Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to the negative pin of the motor
3.Run the Project and then go to the Play Section
